name: POLYGON: Color by Number
description:
Color by number with Polygon app. Take a break and spend some time with top coloring book for adults! Polygon App is a great stress-reliever that helps you to create masterpieces in a simple way.

This low poly puzzle game will definitely help you to relax and create some amazing artworks.
Color and recolor cute pictures — no special set of skills needed! Enjoy it and have fun!

- Amazing choice of wonderful drawing pages: Animals, Birds, Marine, Flowers, Places, Food, People — lots of pictures to explore;
- We prepare special Holiday content so you can celebrate with us;
- Enjoy unique pictures in polygonal style;
- New images are added daily: explore various collections and categories;
- No wifi needed — color top art works anytime, anywhere;
- Share your artworks with friends in one tap.

Painting has never been easier! Relax and enjoy Polygon app!


Polygon Premium.

Polygon Premium is a paid subscription that allows you to unlock all pictures, get rid of interstitials and banner ads.
Weekly subscription with 3-day free trial period is $7.99, monthly $17.99, and annually $69.99 or equal to the same price in USD.
Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
Subscription will be automatically renewed for the same price and duration period, auto-renew can be turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
Your account will be charged for the subscription fee within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period for the price initially selected.

Subscriptions may be managed by you and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's iTunes Account Settings.
For more information please visit the link https://support.apple.com/HT202039.

No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period.
Unused portion of a free-trial period will be forfeited when a user decides to subscribe.
